By the way, there's a bug where you can't see your sniper (it disappears) does this update fix it?
I'm too lazy to check the game, fml.

At least it fixed the crash on exit. Thanks man! Now WE want (NO DEMAND!) a PROPER Tomb Raider 2013 super patch for Nvidia Gefore 600 GTX series of cards! So the game dont crash every 5 th minute. What kind of BS patch was that the first they released, a patch that will crash your game even more frequent?!

@chrisroberts3 hey there i had same issue but i worked out a fix which has stopped all my crashes which occurred every -45 min, all i did was turn OFF tessellation :) sounds stupid and very small thing to fix it but i swear it worked for me try it let me know :)
@chrisroberts3 ******* btw this is in regard to Tomb raider lol, and also i meant to say 4-5 mins**** :)
works with skidrow? is this also some LAN fix update?
hey guys, any1 know if this patch kills existing saves ?
Just want to tell that this fixes the weird artifacts on amd side with HD 6950 at least. (if it downgrades some spec/what it does to archieve that Idk)
